attributes.action: Honour Colonel Gaddafi, President of Libya with an Honorary Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mark of respect for his strong support of the British Economy, BP and his acceptance by the UK Government as an honoured member of the democratic community.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
